REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f1898 reute b f BC-CORRECTION---PARIS--- 03-19 0055
REUTERS.TEXT: CORRECTION - PARIS - FRENCH MINISTER RENEWS Please read at end of first para of item "FRENCH MINISTER RENEWS ECONOMIC CONTROVERSY" "....An economic U-turn, saying it was possible to obtain the results of a reflation without its negative effects." this makes it clear the minister did not use the phrase "boost domestic demand."
